A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The theme to this movie is Plot-holes\, Disney's shallow attempt to \"girl-power\" the Star Wars universe and unnecessary goofy humor (hey - it works for Marvel so we'll throw it in here).  I guess if that's the way the route that Disney wants to take with Star Wars go right ahead - but I won't be running out to see the next movies like I previously had.  Hubby and I saw TFA 4 times in the theater / won't even humor the idea of seeing TLJ again.  I agree with other reviewers - the critics must be getting paid by Disney or they are just afraid to be blackballed by them since Disney now owns Fox studios - they are all sheep.
